description.value:
Once per encounter as a free action, before you make an attack roll using an arcane attack power, you can roll a d6 and add the result to that attack roll. If the attack hits, it deals 2d6 extra damage and you add entropy points to your pool equal to the d6 roll. If it misses, you take 2d6 + your Intelligence modifier damage, and you subtract entropy points from your pool equal to the d6 roll.

Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 121.
